form_metadata.title: ASSURANCE AGREEMENT
form_metadata.subtitle: (Under Title VI, Civil Rights Act of 1964)

acts: Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964

primary_assurance.compliance_statement: Recipient assures compliance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, 7 CFR Part 15, and Agency regulations
primary_assurance.non_discrimination_clause: No person in the United States shall, on the ground of race, color, or national origin, be excluded from participation in, be denied the benefits of, or be otherwise subjected to discrimination in connection with any program or activity for which Recipient receives Federal financial assistance
primary_assurance.federal_financial_assistance_definition: As defined in 7 C.F.R. ยง 14.2

recipient_obligations.title: Transfer obligations
recipient_obligations.requirement: Any transfer of aided facility (other than personal property) by sale, lease or other conveyance shall be subject to this agreement and transferee's assumption of obligations

subsections.requirement: Keep records and submit timely, complete, and accurate information as Government determines necessary for compliance verification
Permit access by authorized Agency or USDA employees during normal business hours to books, records, accounts, information sources, and facilities for compliance verification
Make available to users, participants, beneficiaries and other interested persons information regarding agreement provisions and regulations to inform them of discrimination protection

subsections.duration: As long as property is used for the purpose for which Federal financial assistance was made, or for similar purpose, or as long as Recipient retains ownership/possession, whichever is longer
As long as Recipient retains ownership or possession of the property

subsections.scope: Any other aided facility or activity
subsections.duration: Until the last advance of funds under the loan or grant has been made

government_options.action: Terminate or refuse to render or continue financial assistance for the aided property, facility, project, service or activity
Enforce agreement by suit for specific performance or by any other available remedy under United States or State laws

execution_requirements.corporate: Executed by duly authorized officers with corporate seal affixed

paperwork_reduction_act.response_requirement: No persons required to respond unless valid OMB control number displayed
time_includes: Completing and reviewing collection of information

text: Form RD 400-4 documents assurances of compliance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act for recipients of USDA Rural Development assistance.
